Container.Name: plex-movie-selector
Container.Overview:
A web-based application that helps you select a random movie to watch from your Plex server library with intelligent filtering and rating-based recommendations.
Features: - Smart Rating Grouping - Movies grouped by rating, recommendations from highest-rated - Multi-User Support - Each user has their own preferences and passed movie list - Advanced Filtering - Exclude watched, same actors/directors, filter by decade or actor - Pass System - Pass on movies, excluded for 6 months - Direct Playback - Play recommended movies directly on your active Plex client
After installation, access at http://YOUR-SERVER-IP:5000 and login with your Plex credentials.

Config.Name: Plex Server URL
Config.Description: Plex server URL. Use http://172.17.0.1:32400 if Plex is on the same Unraid server. Use http://YOUR_PLEX_IP:32400 if Plex is on a different machine.

Config.Name: Plex Token (Optional)
Config.Description: Optional: Your Plex authentication token. Get it from https://support.plex.tv/articles/204059436-finding-an-authentication-token-x-plex-token/ - Leave empty to use username/password login.

Config.Name: Secret Key
Config.Description: Secret key for session security. Leave empty to auto-generate. For production, set a random 32+ character string.

Config.Name: Database URI
Config.Description: Database connection string. Default SQLite is recommended.

Config.Name: Debug Mode
Config.Description: Enable debug mode (True/False). Only enable for troubleshooting.
